title: Evaluation of redox pairs for low-grade heat energy harvesting with a thermally regenerative cycle
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00368C, Perspective
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
José Tomás Bórquez Maldifassi, Joseph B. Russell, Jungmyung Kim, Edward Brightman, Xiangjie Chen, Dowon Bae
We present a comprehensive survey of the redox couples and end up with 81 different electrolyte combinations to highlight the untapped potential of the thermally regenerative electrochemical cycle.
